markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 2" pfs="Standard">
[Hunter's Luck](/Spells.aspx?ID=1868)
<actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=682" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 383 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

 

**Trigger** You attempt a check to Recall Knowledge about a creature, but you haven’t rolled yet

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You have a preternatural ability to remember details about your foes. Roll the triggering check twice and use the better result.
name: Hunter's Luck
